<center  style="font-size:40px">About Me </center>

####I am a doctoral student in the Instructional Technology and Learning Sciences department at Utah State University specializing in second language teaching and learning. My research interests include digital game-based language learning, online collaborative reading environments, and developing L2 literacy in dual language immersion programs.
